Psionic_Cut.help: You cut your target with a blade formed from within your mind. This manifested blade causes psionic damage and leaves injuries that cause additional lethal damage over time. The target also suffers a reduction in their attack speed.
Psionic_Cut.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time and have a reduced attack speed.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Psionic_Thrust.help: You hack your target with a blade formed from within your mind. This manifested blade causes psionic damage and leaves injuries that cause additional lethal damage over time. The target also suffers a reduction in their attack speed, chance to hit, regeneration and recovery. The target may also be taunted to attack you if they are not already doing so.
Psionic_Thrust.shortHelp: Melee, Moderate DMG (Psionic), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -Rech(Foe), -ToHit(Foe), -Regen(Foe), -Rec(Foe), Chance for Taunt(Foe)
Psionic_Thrust.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time. You are also experiencing reduced attack speed, chance to hit, regeneration and recovery. You may also be taunted.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Psionic_Slash.help: You slash your target with a blade formed from within your mind. This manifested blade causes psionic damage and leaves injuries that cause additional lethal damage over time. The target also suffers a reduction in their regeneration and damage potential.
Psionic_Slash.shortHelp: Melee (Cone), Moderate DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Lethal), -Regen(Foe), -DMG(Foe, All)
Psionic_Slash.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time. You are also experiencing reduced regeneration and damage potential.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Metabolic_Superiority.help: Your mind exerts an extremely powerful hold over your body, naturally increasing your regeneration rate, attack speed and chance to hit. Moreover, your force of will makes attacks that would reduce these attributes or your movement speeds less effective.

Mental_Breakdown.help: You create a powerful illusion in the minds of your targets, causing them to become rapidly hyperstressed. This causes a cascading reaction in the mind that causes psionic damage. The effects of this reaction linger, causing additional psionic damage over time. Additionally, affected targets suffer reduced regeneration, recovery and healing effectiveness. Finally, the endorphins released within your own body as the success of your attack heal you.
Mental_Breakdown.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Psionic), -Regen(Foe), -Rec(Foe), +RES(Foe, Heal), Heal(Self)
Mental_Breakdown.targetHelp: You are suffering psionic damage over time. Additionally, your regeneration, recovery and healing effectiveness have been reduced.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Psionic_Carapace.help: You create a powerful illusion in the minds of your targets, causing them to become rapidly hyperstressed. This causes a cascading reaction in the mind that causes psionic damage. The effects of this reaction linger, causing additional psionic damage over time. Additionally, affected targets suffer reduced regeneration, recovery and healing effectiveness. Finally, the endorphins released within your own body as the success of your attack heal you.
Psionic_Carapace.targetHelp: You are suffering psionic damage over time. Additionally, your regeneration, recovery and healing effectiveness have been reduced.
